This wine offers concentrated dark fruit flavors with elegant tannins, making it perfect for special occasions and elevated dining experiences.

tastingNotes.aroma: Dark cherry, blackberry, vanilla oak, hints of tobacco, leather, and dried herbs
tastingNotes.palate: Full-bodied with velvety tannins, concentrated dark fruit flavors, balanced acidity, notes of cocoa and spices
tastingNotes.finish: Long, elegant finish with lingering oak and dark fruit notes
